entries.name: Gatorman Bokor and Bog Trog Swamp Shamblers

levels.benefit: You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.

For every two Gatorman Posse units in the army, place one 3" AOE anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Barnabas' deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. The AOE is shallow water terrain. These AOEs cannot be placed within 3 of another terrain feature.

availableModels.models: Croak Hunters, Gatorman solos, Wrong Eye & Snapjaw

levels.benefit: Models/units in this army gain Stealth during the first round of the game
Feralgeist solos in this army gain Advance Move (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
Wrong Eye and warbeasts in his battlegroup gain Advance Deployment.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

availableModels.models: Bog Trog Ambushers, Farrow Bone Grinders, Gatorman units
Croak Hunters, Feralgeists, Gatorman solos, Wrong Eye & Snapjaw

levels.benefit: You can redeploy one model/unit for each Farrow Bone Grinder unit in the army after both players have deployed but before the first player's first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially.
You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.
Warbeasts in the army gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.

tiers.name: Dr. Arkadius - Nature of the Beast (NQ56)

levels.benefit: This army can include Gorax Light Warbeast. This warbeast is considered to be a friendly Farrow warbeast instead of a Orboros unit. Additionally, Gorax in the army gain Shield Guard.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.
Warbeasts in the army can run without being forced during the first round of the game.
Maximus and Farrow Slaughterhouser units gain Advance Deployment.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.
You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.

availableModels.models: Efaarit Scouts, Farrow solos, Gudrun the Wanderer, Rorsh & Brine

tiers.name: Jaga-Jaga, The Death Charmer - VooDoo Dolls

levels.benefit: Undead models gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by Jaga-Jaga’s upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Jaga-Jaga does not pay fury to upkeep these spells during your first turn.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

availableModels.models: Feralgeists, Thrullgs, Bog Trog solos, Croak solos, Gatorman solos, Wrong Eye & Snapjaw

levels.benefit: One Farrow Brigand or Farrow Razorback Crew unit gains Advance Deployment
Model/units in this army gain Pathfinder during your first tum of the game.
Models in Carver's battlegroup gains gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
Models/units in the army gain Incorporeal during your first turn of the game.

Up to one model with Undead gain Advance Move for each Gatorman Witch Doctor solo in the army. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
Boneswarm warbeasts in this army each begin the game with one corpse token.

availableModels.models: Minion units with Amphibious, Minion units with Undead
Gatorman Witch Doctor, Minion solos with Undead, Wrong Eye & Snapjaw

levels.benefit: Midas' battlegroup can include Boneswarm warbeasts.

For each Farrow Bone Grinder unit in the army, one warbeast in Midas' battlegroup gains Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
For each Slaughterhouser unit in the army, one Boneswarm warbeast begins the game with three corpse tokens.
Add one Farrow non-character warbeast to Midas' battlegroup. The warbeast begins the game destroyed.
Solos in the army gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
For every two units in the army, add a Croak Hunter solo to the army free of cost.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

availableModels.models: Gatorman Bokor & Bog Trog, Swamp Shamblers, Bog Trog units
Thrullg, Minion solos with Amphibious, Totem Hunter

levels.benefit:
Before determining which player deploys first at the start of the game declare wether Sturm or Drang will be dominant during
            the first round of the game. If Drang is dominant, warbeasts in this army gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game. If
            Sturm is dominant friendly models/units can begin the game affected by Sturm's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Sturm does not pay fury to upkeep these spells during your first turn.
You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.
Farrow Slaughterhouser units gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
Increase the FA of all non-character Gatorman models and units included in the army by +1 ; you can place two AOE 3 shallow water templates 20" of the back edge of your deployment zone.

availableModels.models: Minion Warbeasts that can be affiliated to warlocks in this contract.
Minion units with Amphibious, and Swamp Gobber Bellows Crew.
Minion solos with Amphibious, and Feralgeists, Thrullg, Totem Hunter, Viktor Pendrake

levels.benefit: All Farrow units in a Thornfall list get Advance Deployment.

availableModels.models: Minion Farrow Warbeasts that can be affiliated to warlocks in this contract.
Minion Farrow solos, and Alten Ashley, Gudrun the Wanderer, Saxon Orrik, Viktor Pendrake
